Class GameAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.lunalunera.controller.GameAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameController
public class GameAdapter extends Object implements IGameController
Adapter class which implements the method in the interface iGameController

  • Method Details

    • handleFocusField

      public void handleFocusField(int index)
      Method which sees if a text field is selected. If yes, then it switches from the sleeping image to the first image of the moon game.
      Specified by:
      handleFocusField in interface IGameController
      Parameters:
      index - The specific textField being handled

    • handleHelpButton

      public void handleHelpButton()
      Method which calls the helpWithTheSecretWord() method when the helpButton is clicked and sums one to the counter of helps used If 4 helps are used, the button is disabled
      Specified by:
      handleHelpButton in interface IGameController
      See Also:
      • ChecksGameController.helpWithTheSecretWord()

    • handleTextFields

      public void handleTextFields(int index)
      Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter in the array is a subset of the regular expression, which is, if the letter is a legal one. If not, it returns to the previous letter
      Specified by:
      handleTextFields in interface IGameController
      Parameters:
      index - an int which specifies the textField of the array

    • handleCorrectAnswers

      public void handleCorrectAnswers(int index)
      Method which add a listener to one textField of the array and see if the new letter is one of the secret word by using the isACorrectAnswer() method. If yes, it disables the text field. If not, it puts the textField in red and puts that textField as a failed attempt in a boolean[], forcing to erase the letter and try again. It also counts and shows the failed attempts.
      Specified by:
      handleCorrectAnswers in interface IGameController
      Parameters:
      index - the textField which is being verified
      See Also:
      • ChecksGameController.isACorrectAnswer(String, int)

    • handleAllTextFields

      public void handleAllTextFields()
      It runs the handleTextFields() and handleCorrectAnswers() methods in all the textField array
      Specified by:
      handleAllTextFields in interface IGameController
      See Also:
      • handleTextFields(int)
      • handleCorrectAnswers(int)
